summary: Backend / Fullstack Developer with hands-on experience in ASP.NET MVC, C#, PHP, SQL. Experienced in REST APIs, CI/CD, unit testing, performance optimization, and clean architecture.

achievements: Engineered CI/CD system automating multi-module unit tests, reducing manual QA time by 90%
Implemented GitHub-triggered job queueing and commit status updates
Collaborated with AI Specialists for RAG workflows for automated unit test generation
Sole developer of enterprise Asset Management System for nationwide stores
Designed ASP.NET MVC system with normalized SQL Server schemas
Implemented RBAC with user roles, profiles, module-level permissions
Developed CRUD modules for assets, users, departments, device assignments
Automated asset lifecycle rules (ownership transfer for devices older than 4 years)
